lesser_vitality_draught.name: Lesser Vitality Draught
lesser_vitality_draught.description: A simple yet effective drink that restores a bit of lost energy. Invaluable in minor skirmishes.

minor_restoration_phial.name: Minor Restoration Phial
minor_restoration_phial.description: A glass phial filled with a soothing liquid. Brings relief and allows you to quickly return to full strength.

standard_life_potion.name: Standard Life Potion
standard_life_potion.description: The essence of life in liquid form. A solid dose of regeneration for those who have sustained more serious wounds.

greater_vigor_tonic.name: Greater Vigor Tonic
greater_vigor_tonic.description: A thick elixir that strengthens both body and spirit. Allows for greater exertion and increases resistance to the hardships of the journey.

major_mending_brew.name: Major Mending Brew
major_mending_brew.description: A potent concoction with an intense herbal aroma. Heals deep wounds and restores vitality in the blink of an eye.

supreme_essence_of_life.name: Supreme Essence of Life
supreme_essence_of_life.description: The rarest and most precious of elixirs. Contains the pure essence of life, capable of reversing even the most severe injuries.

old_mop.name: Old Mop
old_mop.description: A worn-out mop, surprisingly sturdy. Might be useful for more than cleaning.

rusty_dagger.name: Rusty Dagger
rusty_dagger.description: A pitted and dull dagger, better than nothing.

gold_coins_small.name: Small Pouch of Coins
gold_coins_small.description: A few clinking coins. Enough for a cheap meal.

hungry_mugger.name: Hungry Mugger
hungry_mugger.description: A desperate figure with hunger in their eyes and a glint of steel.

ash_and_soil.name: Ash and Soil
ash_and_soil.description: You are {name}, a poor farmer from a dying village. With nothing left, you've just arrived in the city of Eldoria, cold and hungry.

choices.text: Search the alleys for work or food.
choices.outcome_text: You wander into a shady alley. A desperate-looking figure eyes your meager belongings and approaches menacingly.

on_win.text: You manage to fend off the mugger. They drop something as they flee.

on_lose.text: The mugger overpowers you, taking what little you had. You're left bruised and even more destitute.

choices.text: Go straight to the tavern district.
choices.outcome_text: You navigate the muddy, crowded streets and find 'The Leaky Mug', a tavern reeking of mold, stale beer, and unwashed bodies.

filth_and_ale.name: Filth and Ale at The Leaky Mug
filth_and_ale.description: The barkeep at 'The Leaky Mug', a burly man named Grond, grudgingly hires you as a cleaner. It's hard, thankless work, but it provides a roof (of sorts) and scraps of food. You are now at The Leaky Mug.

choices.text: Keep sweeping floors and emptying chamber pots.
choices.outcome_text: You toil away for weeks, becoming a fixture in the tavern's grimy background. One night, a boisterous group of mercenaries stumbles in, their voices loud and their armor clanking.

choices.text: Ask Grond the barkeep about better work.
choices.outcome_text: Grond scoffs, wiping a tankard. 'Better work? You barely manage this. Prove you're not useless first.' He shoves a particularly grimy mop at you.

leaky_mug_entrance.name: The Leaky Mug - Entrance
leaky_mug_entrance.description: You stand at the entrance of 'The Leaky Mug'. The air is thick with smoke and the din of patrons. What do you do?

choices.text: Approach the barkeep and ask for work.
choices.outcome_text: The barkeep, Grond, sizes you up.

choices.text: Try to observe the patrons, perhaps overhear something useful.
choices.outcome_text: You try to blend in. Most conversations are drunken ramblings, but you catch snippets about city guard patrols and rising food prices. Nothing immediately useful.

choices.text: This place isn't for you. Leave.
choices.outcome_text: You decide the tavern isn't the best place to start. You step back out into the muddy streets.

whispers_of_fire.name: Whispers of Fire
whispers_of_fire.description: One evening, while scrubbing near a table occupied by the recently arrived mercenaries, you overhear their hushed, excited talk. They speak of a dragon stirring in the northern forests – of smoke, fire, and an ancient, slumbering threat.

choices.text: Subtly try to eavesdrop more on the mercenaries.
choices.outcome_text: They laugh off the danger, boasting of glory and treasure. But their words ignite something within you – a strange pull towards the north, a sense of destiny you can't explain.

choices.text: Ignore their dangerous talk and focus on your cleaning.
choices.outcome_text: You try to push their words from your mind, focusing on the grime. Yet, the tales of fire and shadow linger, unsettling your thoughts.

restless_night.name: A Restless Night
restless_night.description: You can't sleep. The whispers of fire and the north echo in your mind. The city feels suffocating. An undeniable urge pulls you towards the wilderness.

choices.text: Gather your meager belongings and head north into the woods.
choices.outcome_text: Under the cloak of darkness, you slip out of Eldoria and venture into the foreboding northern forest.

choices.text: Try to ignore the feeling and stay in the city. It's safer here.
choices.outcome_text: You force yourself to stay, to continue your mundane life. But the call of the north never truly fades, leaving a lingering sense of regret and unfulfilled purpose.

into_the_forest.name: Into the Forest
into_the_forest.description: Hours pass as you walk deeper into the oppressive darkness of the northern woods. No beasts attack. No sign of fire. Just an unnerving silence... until a piercing scream cuts through the night air nearby!

choices.outcome_text: You cautiously move towards the sound...

choices.text: That sounds dangerous. Turn back to Eldoria.
choices.outcome_text: Fear grips you. This adventure is too much. You turn and flee back towards the relative safety of the city.

game_over_mugged.name: Game Over - Mugged
game_over_mugged.description: Beaten and robbed, you have nothing left. The harsh streets of Eldoria claim another victim. Your adventure ends here.

end_mundane_life.name: A Quiet End
end_mundane_life.description: You live out your days in Eldoria, always wondering about the path not taken. The whispers of fire fade into a distant memory. Your life is safe, but unremarkable.

end_cowardice.name: Return to Safety
end_cowardice.description: You return to Eldoria, shaken but alive. The forest's secrets remain hidden from you. Perhaps some adventures are best left to others.

end_cliffhanger.name: To Be Continued...
end_cliffhanger.description: The forest is dark, and the source of the scream awaits. Your journey has truly begun... (To be continued).
